name: Twelve Islands for Life
description:
Twelve outposts, that's all humanity has left after a big environmental disaster. Twelve small islands for life  must be saved at all costs for the future of mankind.

You are one of the several aeronauts, people who transport vital goods in balloons. Your story depends only on you and the weather that accompanies you.

Supported languages

English
Russian

Control

Space - Turn on the burner
C - Dump hot air
